sub_title: Supply Chain Management // Logistics & Operations Manager// Continuous Improvement // Future proofing
summary:
An energetic passionate individual with strong values, strong sense of responsibility, drive and integrity.  I am known to be touch but fair, I have empathy however clear on accountability.  
My focus is on quality and development of lean business processes, reducing waste, continuous improvement, enhancement of people. 

2010 to 2023 I immigrated to the Netherlands,  joined DHL SC Life Sciences managing logistical and operational customer facing activities for Shire Pharmaceuticals, Alere, Merck, Welch Allyn etc.  I joined Amgen Pharmaceutical in 2015 as Cold Chain Transportation Specialist for Global Supply Hub developing the distribution capabilities internationally for Amgen.  2020 I joined Maersk Logistics and Services as EU Cold Chain Product manager establishing and developing the Cold Chain Logistics capabilities with the European, UKI, Northern Africa and Scandinavian region and worked on  establishing the Quality Management system and processes for the Pharmaceutical vertical within Maersk.  

Prior to 2005 I worked 12 year in Credit and Risk management in South Africa.  2005 I followed my dreams for international multi-cultural experience, and went to work in Afghanistan for the USA Government and USAID as an aviation contract manager covering aviation, logistics operations, base management. Additionally scouted for new locations within Afghanistan for further expansion and development. 

Working in Afghanistan as a female Base/Flight Ops manager has broaden my people management and operational skills in the warzone aviation arena, international multi-cultural and foreign governments fields.

school.name: Good Hope Flying Club and Flight Training

profile_positions.description:
Responsible as Cold Chain Logistics product manager my focus is on:
•	Establish and develop cold chain logistics capacity in Europe, Northern
        Africa, the UK, and Ireland.
•	Establish a Cold Chain Logistics infrastructure and network through own, leased and managed
         cold stores and external transport service providers.
•	Provide sales training and enablement.
•	Responsible for continuous product/process development and improvement.
•	Developing a quality management system for pharmaceutical logistics

Achievements: 
•	Acknowledged for the establishing of the Grape Cold Chain from India to Netherlands, 2022
•	Completed 6 successfully executed high value pharmaceutical products shipping trials for 
        Samsung Pharmaceuticals Korea resulting in contracting the business ensuring distribution 
        cost reduction for the customer by air to ocean conversion from Korea to Italy.
•	Created cold store development roadmap for 13 cold stores throughout Europe till 2023.
•	Secured 3 (Aarhus, Zaragoza, Maasvlakte) investment projects board approvals.
•	Contracted 3rd party cold store service provider. Fruit & Veg, Pharma GDP certified
        warehouse, 
•	Signed up 3rd party logistics service providers as network extension (transportation)
•	Grew EU CCL product revenue with >250% between year 1 and 2.
•	Implemented a quality management system for pharmaceutical logistics.
profile_positions.title: Cold Chain Product Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Pharmaceutical cold chain transportation specialist.
•	Develop new or alternative multimodal GDP compliant distribution lanes into Turkey, Middle
        East and Africa, USA and Australia.
•	Continuous transportation management process improvement.
•	Quality management of distribution processes.
•	Deviation, CAPAs, Change controls Development of controlled temperature shipping containers.


Achievements
•	Awarded for Highest Impact Project for 2018,
•	Conversion from Air to Ocean saving the company 3mill euro in distribution cost in one year. 
•	Developed and implemented 3 alternative passive shipper solutions reducing transportation
        costs decreased product losses due to reduction in temperature excursions impacting product.
•	Implemented return logistics for leased re-useable shipping solutions.
profile_positions.title: Pharmaceutical Cold chain Transportation Specialist  GSHE

profile_positions.description:
Customer Service Supervisor - DHL LIFE SCIENCES & HEALTHCARE

•Supervising of 8 customer service agents and operations support officers.
•Planning and coordinating daily, weekly and monthly targets between CS & WHS
•Customer focus team : CS & WHS
•Invoicing & credit control of customers, 
•Responsible for sending monthly statement of account to all customers.
•Issue letters per week to follow up payments and queries with customers.
•Review statement of account and clear old due invoices with customer.
•Follow up with customers for payments/queries by phones, emails and official letters
•Issue credit notes for customers by using ICB and Oracle
•Escalation point for customer problems
•Monthly business reviews with customers
•Quarterly business reviews with customers
•Setting up of new customers – SOP / Service Level Agreements / Technical Agreement 
•Calculating KPI’s and reporting to customer and senior management
•Inbound Dock-to-Stock, Inventory Accuracy, On-time deliveries, Customer complaints management.
•Personnel management: Personal development programs, Job performance analysis,
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Supervisor

profile_positions.description:
Mar 09 – Apr 10 Field Operations Manager & Site/Revenue Development Specialist. Responsible for enhancing relations with Afghan governing bodies, line ministries, provincial governors, police authorities and the national Ministry of Transport and Civil Aviation (MOTCA). Emphasis on project implementation; forward site and revenue development. Success in scouting locations and identifying future operations sites to enhance operational capabilities for the company and increase their ability to meet their contractual requirements and ultimately improve revenue posture.  Success in writing standard operating procedures (SOP) for all operations and administrative systems currently in use.

Oct 08 – July 09 Reservations and Customer Service manager and International Contract Liaison Officer
Assigned to dealing directly with USAID headquarters and US Government departments and Foreign Embassies in-country. Successful implementation of new online reservations system “Skyline”. Success in training all personnel involved in the running of the online reservations system; setting up of full check-in and reservations system and departments.  

Oct 2007 to Oct 2008 Base & Flight Operations Manager USAID Air for ACS,responsible for operational oversight, personnel management, co-ordinations of flight operations department.  Successful management of a multi-aircraft aviation support contract with the US Department of State, USAID, International Security Assistance Forces (ISAF); the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO); Roshan Commercial Services, Recon Services and the Afghan Government.  Duties included the scheduling of all aircraft, and flight crews.
Duties included flight planning in an International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) operational environment, coordinating with joint civil-military aviation entities for aircraft operations in the war zone; ensuring accuracy and accountability of all required operational documentation for crews and base operations.
profile_positions.title: Flight Operations/Base Manager - Afghanistan

profile_positions.description: Success in scheduling and coordinating international flight operations. Supervised a multi-aircraft aviation support contract with the US Department of State (DoS).  Coordinated accountability and use of assets with the on-site DoS Program Leadership; including ten UH-1HS aircraft supporting Afghanistan’s Ministry of Interior counter-narcotics efforts and the Civilian Police Program for the US Embassy, Afghanistan.  Additional duties included flight planning in an International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) operational environment, coordinating with joint civil-military aviation entities for aircraft operations in the war zone; ensuring accuracy and accountability of all required operational documentation for crews and base operations.
profile_positions.title: Flight Operations Co-ordinator - Afghanistan

profile_positions.description: Successfully-administered a Commercial Flight Operation at Kabul International Airport. Successfully led the operations section of the company to US FAA Part 135 operational certification.  Performed and provided oversight to all aviation-related administrative support of flight crews and aircraft.  Additional duties included accounting and administration; implementation of Enterprise Solution Software (Quick Books) into the business model; training of administrative staff on accounting principles, local procedures, and Enterprise software.  Performed bank reconciliations and trained the staff on accounts payable and receivable. Represented corporate executive management during regular client visits and relationship building.
profile_positions.title: Flight Operations Manager / Accounts Manager

profile_positions.description: Analyzed and reported on debtor’s financial accounts, performed financial calculations; produced management reports and cash flow predictions; Implemented procedures for credit control. Responsible for control of all incoming cash, record keeping, banking, and balancing.  Trained, supervised, disciplined and motivated warehouse, administrative and sales staff.  Successfully established and implemented monthly performance targets and incentives. Created new accounts of new business and established terms and conditions, coordinated credit insurance via credit insurance companies, handled legal clients and corresponded with credit insurance companies.
profile_positions.title: Credit/Admin Manager - Cape Town

profile_positions.description: Duties include Full Credit Management Functions for Office Automation Solution Systems Company, providing printers & copiers throughout South Africa and the African Continent through resale. Responsible for company banking, statement reconciliation; management of Petty Cash; liaison with Company Creditors; Control of Personnel Issues and Training; Stock and Contracts Control; Processing of all sales (i.e., all processing of contract papers); Client Financials, company registrations, legal documentation for rental contracts; Liaising with finance houses, and customers to get final deal signed and invoices;  Full Office Administration function; Staff  training, motivating, and supervision of 24 personnel (7 credit / 3 administration / 14 sales).
profile_positions.title: Credit/Admin Manager - Cape Town
